story.text: I trained as a mathematician, and now work for a large computer firm in Hursley, England, Europe (that's outside the US, guys).
I have strong interests in Software Engineering, Transaction Processing, Recreational Mathematics and Number Theory, Barbershop Singing, the Z Specification Language, and Coffee.
I have lesser interests in Java, Functional Programming, Chocolate, Walking, Labrador Dogs, Teaching and Coffee.

OK I have added a comment or two to a page on this Wiki, so this isn't my only page.
I am still struggling with [[La Tex]] on Windows NT (with Z language support) to write a large, fairly mathematical report. Maybe I can get help here.
Work, of course, occupies my every waking moment.
<hr>
You're welcome to try [[Math Quiz One]] while you're sleeping! -- vk
<hr>
[[Category Home Page]]
See original on  [http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?StevePowell c2.com]
